content.question:
The rate of fuel consumption, in gallons per minute, recorded during an airplane flight is given by a twice-differentiable and strictly increasing function R of time t. The graph of R and a table of selected values of R(t), for the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 90 minutes, are shown above.

(a) Use data from the table to find an approximation for R'(45). Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text:
The rate of fuel consumption, in gallons per minute, recorded during an airplane flight is given by a twice-differentiable and strictly increasing function R of time t. The graph of R and a table of selected values of R(t), for the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 90 minutes, are shown above.

(a) Use data from the table to find an approximation for R'(45). Show the computations that lead to your answer. Indicate units of measure.
(b) The rate of fuel consumption is increasing fastest at time t = 45 minutes. What is the value of R''(45)? Explain your reasoning.

(c) Approximate the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mrow> <mn>90</mn></mrow> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaaiMda caaIWaaaniabgUIiYdGcdaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@433F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> using a left Riemann sum with the five subintervals indicated by the data in the table. Is this numerical approximation less than the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mrow> <mn>90</mn></mrow> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaaiMda caaIWaaaniabgUIiYdGcdaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@433F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>? Explain your reasoning.

(d) For 0 < b ≤ 90 minutes, explain the meaning of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaadkga a0Gaey4kIipakmaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaam izaiaadshaaaa@42A9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> in terms of fuel consumption for the plane. Explain the meaning of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>b</mi> </mfrac> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mi>b</mi> </msubsup> <mi>R</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaadkgaaaWaa8qma8aabaWdbiaadkfaaSWd aeaapeGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGaamOyaaqdcqGHRiI8aOWaaeWaa8aaba WdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaa@445B@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> in terms of fuel consumption for the plane. Indicate units of measure in both answers.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
